Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Vincent H Pon
Reviews.Content: BUYER BEWARE: Unlocked phones from J&R; do NOT come with a warranty from the manufacturer.  No where is this stated on the product page.  I purchased on in June, it broke in November. Neither J&R;, LG nor Amazon will warranty it.  I'm short $175 and SOL.

Reviews.Title: Mulongo
Reviews.Author: Mpoyo Mulongo
Reviews.Content: I did not like it. I was badly used. I even returned it. May be I can like a new one

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Manrique
Reviews.Content: Thanks for all... is a very happy with this product, in the future  i contact again in case necesary for another product.
